analysis.description:
ReferToken.depositMintAndPay (/unique_chucks/17/0xdf8ee682d538d9a6f8d8e97fe7635baa5c27b63d.sol#311-322) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(userPackages[_to].since == 0)
